about_the_game:
“Influence is the ability to manipulate social relationships in order to favor your own interests. Whoever holds this power is the master of gathering information used to persuade, dissuade and direct others' actions. Influence is the connection with Society strengthened by human interaction and the development of knowledge.”

The Influence Kit will allow you to strengthen your Collection with Influence Cards (blue). It includes:

  • 6 Influence (blue) Card Packs
  • 500 Organite
  • Unique Influence Card Back



Each Influence Card Pack includes 5 Cards of Influence (blue) with different Rarity (Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary), allowing you to start upgrading your Influence Decks, including the Faction (dual-colored) Decks.

Keep in mind that for every 20 Card Packs you open in the game, you’ll receive a Legendary Card Pack for free. This type of pack guarantees a Legendary Card.



Organite (Crystals) may be spent in the game to buy items such as Leaders (750 Organite), Card Packs (200 Organite), Card Backs (750 Organite), and more!



Add the Unique Influence Card Back to your collection, and showcase it while battling your enemies. After the end of the Early Access, this item will only be available by acquiring this kit.

This kit can only be purchased on Steam once per account. If you already had the Influence Card Back in your Collection, you will get all the other items included in the kit, and a full reimbursement of the Card Back in gold.
